name: purchase_item
attributes: # [doc = " ユーザーがアイテムを購入するが、"]
# [doc = " InventoryAccount.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let inv = & mut ctx . accounts . inventory ;
let total_cost = shop . price_per_item . checked_mul (quantity) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= total_cost ;
* * ctx . accounts . shop_treasury . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += total_cost ;

fields.name: inventory
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] などで InventoryAccount.owner と"] # [doc = " ctx.accounts.user.key() の一致を検証すべき"]

fields.attribute: # [doc = " 購入代金を貯めるショップの財務口座"] # [account (mut)]
